gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui.MainFragments

Class ConfigurationListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui.MainFragments.ConfigurationFragment
        • gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui.MainFragments.ConfigurationListFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, OnIonStatusChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BabRuleFragment, BcbRuleFragment, BibRuleFragment, ContactFragment, EndpointFragment, InductFragment, KeyFragment, OutductFragment, ProtocolFragment, RangeFragment, SchemeFragment

    public abstract class ConfigurationListFragment
extends ConfigurationFragment
    Fragment class that uses an RecyclerView to provide an configuration option for a certain ION object. Usually used as superclass.
